subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
''{{w|Shuowen}}'': {{Han compound|尸|彳|夊|舟|ls=ic|t2=step|t3=foot|t4=(shoe-shaped) boat}}. Possibly {{liushu|psc|nocap=1|adj=1}}, with {{och-l|尸}} functioning as a phonetic component.

{{w|Bronze inscriptions}}: {{Han compound|眉|頁|止|舟|ls=ic|t2=person with prominent head|t3=foot|t4=shoe or (shoe-shaped) boat}}.

Modern form is a compound of {{Han compound|尸|復|t2=return}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[shoe]]; [[footwear]]
# [[foot]]
# [[territory]]
# to [[tread]] on; to [[walk]] on
# to [[put on]] [[shoes]]
# to [[ascend]] the [[throne]]; to [[assume]] (a role)
# to [[experience]]; to [[undergo]]
# to [[fulfil]]; to [[implement]]; to [[carry out]]
# to [[carry out]] [[personally]]
# [[tenth]] [[hexagram]] of the [[I Ching]]
